demographics.name: Maria Garcia
demographics.mobility: Requires walker for ambulation due to L weakness.

diagnosis.primary: Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) - Adenocarcinoma
diagnosis.symptomsAtPresentation: Worsening headaches, new onset left-sided weakness, cognitive changes.
diagnosis.baselineStatus: ECOG 2 (Ambulatory and capable of self-care but unable to carry out work activities. Up >50% of waking hours)
pathologyFindings: Biopsy of right upper lobe lung mass confirms Adenocarcinoma.
Molecular testing: EGFR exon 19 deletion positive.

treatmentPlan.concurrentChemo: None during RT. Systemic: Pembrolizumab (managed by Med Onc).
medications: Dexamethasone 4 mg PO BID (started 03/21/2025 for cerebral edema)
therapistAlerts: Fall risk; assist with all transfers to and from treatment table.
Patient may be fatigued from high disease burden.

ctSimulation.setupInstructions: Supine, neutral head position, custom thermoplastic mask for immobilization. SAD setup.
ctSimulation.referenceMarks: Mask marks aligned to room lasers at external auditory meatus (EAM). Isocenter at L0.0, L0.0, V+2.0 from reference.

dosimetry.planStatus: Final - Approved by Dr. Samuel Green
dosimetry.collAngles: 0 (shaped to include whole brain, avoid eyes)
dosimetry.constraints: Lens Max < 8 Gy; Optic Nrv Max < 25 Gy. All constraints met.
dosimetry.planNotes: Standard palliative 10-fraction WBRT. Hippocampal avoidance not indicated given palliative intent and extent of disease.
